about_the_game:
“Sharpen your fangs, wolves! The hunt begins!”
- Geigor Fell-Hand

Lead the Sons of Fenris into battle! The Space Wolves arrive as the first Legion in the Inferno expansion, ready to take the fight to the traitors.

Get a head start with this amazing bundle, which includes:
  • An epic Warlord: Geigor Fell-hand, Commander of the Blooded Claws
  • 1 Legendary Space Wolves crate, with one guaranteed Legendary card for Space Wolves
  • 10 Space Wolves crates, featuring the new cards released in the Inferno expansion
This bundle offers great value, and brings enough cards to build a full deck of Space Wolves. Take command of them and fight for the Allfather!

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains content not appropriate for all ages, including infrequent strong language, depictions of violence and gore, and online interaction between players.
